results.overview: Albert Nobbs struggles to survive in late 19th century Ireland, where women aren't encouraged to be independent. Posing as a man, so she can work as a butler in Dublin's most posh hotel, Albert meets a handsome painter and looks to escape the lie she has been living.
results.title: Albert Nobbs

results.overview: Wicket the Ewok and his friends agree to help two shipwrecked human children, Mace and Cindel, on a quest to find their parents.
results.title: The Ewok Adventure

results.original_title: Ensemble, nous allons vivre une très, très grande histoire d'amour...
results.overview: Dorothée and Nicolas fall in love at first sight. Together, they’re going to live a very beautiful love story... they know it. But life always finds a way to compromise the best resolutions, the best script, and nothing will happen as expected. Nicolas and Dorothée will be carried into a stormy comedy as crazy as their passion for each other…
results.title: A Very Very Beautiful Love Story

results.original_title: To End All War: Oppenheimer & the Atomic Bomb
results.overview: Explore how one man's relentless drive and invention of the atomic bomb changed the nature of war forever, led to the deaths of hundreds of thousands of people and unleashed mass hysteria.
results.title: To End All War: Oppenheimer & the Atomic Bomb

results.overview: Camila is a young member of an elite police unit. During an operation in a dangerous area, she turns up in the middle of a ritual, in which their members burnt themselves to death. She suffers severe burns all over her body and goes into a coma. In her long recovery, her friend Fatima, a criminal prosecutor, and her partner and ex-boyfriend Ángel will help her. But Camila acts strange, she is distant, emotionless. The albino, a female figure who is attached to her soul since the ritual episode, is here to play a game with the three of them.
results.title: Don't Come Back Alive

results.original_title: Je ne suis pas un homme facile
results.overview: The chauvinist Damien wakes up in a world where women and men have their roles reversed in society, and everything is dominated by women.
results.title: I Am Not an Easy Man

results.overview: Two groups of classic cartoon characters come together in this fun-filled crossover with the popular action-adventure series Jonny Quest. Fans of all ages won't want to miss this heart-stopping romp as Tom and Jerry join Jonny Quest and his pal Hadji and embark on a dangerous spy mission in order to save the world.
results.title: Tom and Jerry: Spy Quest

results.overview: Life for a single mom in Los Angeles takes an unexpected turn when she allows three young guys to move in with her.
results.title: Home Again

results.original_title: A Nightmare on Elm Street 3: Dream Warriors
results.overview: During a hallucinatory incident, Kristen Parker has her wrists slashed by dream-stalking monster, Freddy Krueger. Her mother, mistaking the wounds for a suicide attempt, sends her to a psychiatric ward, where she joins a group of similarly troubled teens.
results.title: A Nightmare on Elm Street 3: Dream Warriors

results.overview: The true story of suburban housewife Gertrude Baniszewski, who kept a teenage girl locked in the basement of her Indiana home during the 1960s.
results.title: An American Crime

results.overview: The true, harrowing story of a young Jewish girl who, with her family and their friends, is forced into hiding in an attic in Nazi-occupied Amsterdam.
results.title: The Diary of Anne Frank

results.overview: In their last year of high school, two girls in the brass band club perform a song inspired by a fairy tale that parallels their friendship.
results.title: Liz and the Blue Bird

results.overview: Benny, a college freshman at the University of Akron, Ohio meets and falls for fellow freshman Christopher at a football game. With the support of their families and friends they embark on a new relationship. But a tragic event in the past involving their mothers soon comes to light and threatens to tear them apart.
results.title: Akron

results.overview: Kim Sun-woo is an enforcer and manager for a hotel owned by a cold, calculative crime boss, Kang who assigns Sun-woo to a simple errand while he is away on a business trip; to shadow his young mistress, Hee-soo, for fear that she may be cheating on him with a younger man with the mandate that he must kill them both if he discovers their affair.
results.title: A Bittersweet Life

results.overview: When an outbreak hits, Aidan barricades himself inside his apartment and starts rationing food. His complex is overrun by infected Screamers, and with the world falling apart into chaos, he is left completely alone fighting for his life.
results.title: Alone

results.original_title: Dognapped: A Hound for the Holidays
results.overview: When an egotistical social media influencer's dog is kidnapped, her long-suffering assistant teams up with charming local vet to find the puppy before Christmas. As the two investigate suspects, they form a romantic bond along the way.
results.title: Dognapped: A Hound for the Holidays

results.original_title: Trois temps après la mort d’Anna
results.overview: A mother deals with the violent murder of her daughter.
results.title: Mourning for Anna

results.original_title: A Comedy Celebration: The Comedy & Magic Club's 10th Anniversary
results.overview: A variety special, taped October 30, 1988 during the 10th anniversary of the Comedy & Magic Club in Hermosa Beach, California, featuring routines by stand-up comics.
results.title: A Comedy Celebration: The Comedy & Magic Club's 10th Anniversary

results.overview: A folklore professor becomes unwittingly possessed by the ancient Japanese demons of Thunder and Lightning. But when The Bureau of Paranormal Research & Defense dispatches a team of agents to investigate, a cursed samurai sword sends Hellboy to a supernatural dimension of ghosts, monsters, and feudal mayhem. Now while pyrokinetic Liz Sherman and fishboy Abe Sapien battle one very pissed-off dragon, a lost and cranky Hellboy must find his way home.
results.title: Hellboy Animated: Sword of Storms

results.original_title: Al di là del bene e del male
results.overview: The life and ideas of the German philosopher Friedrich Nietzsche. A love triangle unfolds as Nietzsche and his best friend decides to live with a Jewish woman. According to Nietzsche's philosophy, that is beyond all morality. Depicting Nietzsche's opium addiction and madness meritorious.
results.title: Beyond Good and Evil
